tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Dangerous Game
programme.desc: A deputy sheriff dies while chasing a car carrying two SEALs in a Navy exercise. The driver stands trial for negligent homicide.(n)

programme.title: JAG: In Thin Air
programme.desc: Lt. Albrecht and Lt. Cmdr. Zuzello make Zuzello’s farewell flight before he retires. All is fine until Albrecht notices that his partner is passed out from hypoxia. Albrecht makes an emergency landing on the ship.Harm is sent to the ship to investigate.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Need to Know
programme.desc: As a favor from Congresswoman Lillian Dorning, SECNAV Sheffield asks the JAG staff to get the story of a submarine, USS Angel Shark (SSGN-559), which was lost on a CIA mission in 1968.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Friendly Fire
programme.desc: Harm serves as a judge and Mac is the contentious prosecutor in a case fraught withpolitical implications when an American aviator is charged with killing three Britishsoldiers during a flight mission in Afghanistan.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Shifting Sands
programme.desc: When a Gulf War MIA victim is found as the sheik’s wife in a nomadic Arab tribe, Bud prosecutes and Mac defends her against charges of desertion and, in a stunning turn of events, treason. Harm tries to get his old job back but is turned away.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Kill Screen
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must help Ralph when the FBI questions him after his dark web game play inadvertently reveals the location of a CIA safe house and results in the murder of CIA operatives.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Charades
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is tasked with uncovering a mole inside the CIA whose judgment is clouded by matters of the heart and is being coerced into stealing deadly chemicals.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Forget Me Nots
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must jog the memory of an injured former Secret Service agent who is their only hope of preventing weapons of mass destruction being launched from a secret U.S. nuclear silo.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Love Boat
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover on a cruise ship to locate and disable deadly stolen rockets.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Going South
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Mexico when a tech billionaire hires them to rescue his kidnapped daughter.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees
programme.desc: Andy heads out with a very-pregnant Marlo to find a volatile woman who’s gone missing after group therapy, but neither Andy nor Marlo are prepared when Marlo suddenly goes into labor.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Blink
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the night’s traumatic events, Andy and Dov try to pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-duty and off-guard in a volatile diner hold-up.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: All by Her Selfie
programme.desc: Oliver gets promoted and Andy is tasked with training 15 Division’s newest rookie, Duncan Moore. But when Andy and Duncan respond to a messy homicide at a pawnshop, it’s clear this rookie is going to give Andy the challenge of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: SECRET LOCATION PT2
programme.desc: Most Haunted's deadliest investigation, Part 2. Spirits emerging, team's resolve tested as darkness envelops. Growing fear, team's safety at stake. Can they continue?(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette starts the new series with an investigation at the haunted Eden Camp. Strange noises and an unknown force try to separate the team. Can they endure the entire investigation, or will the paranormal activity prove too much for them to handle?(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her world-famous team continue investigating Eden Camp. Splitting into lone vigils, they quickly regret it as lost souls, dark shadows, and disembodied voices haunt this living museum, all eager to make their presence known.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Princess and the EVP
programme.desc: The final day has arrived –it's Grant's last investigation with TAPS. And where better to close out his phenomenal run but at Jason and Grant's very own haunted property, Spalding Inn, located in Whitefield, New Hampshire.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: I Am Not Guilty
programme.desc: The TAPS team investigates the home of Dr. Samuel Mudd, an alleged conspirator to the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Lemp Mansion
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, the TAPS team is invited to Lemp Mansion in St. Louis, Missouri. There have been tragic deaths at this mansion with the patriarch and three of his children taking their own lives.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.sub-title: Tunnel at the End of the Light
programme.desc: With fifty parties on board, Dylan hosts the signing of the New Commonwealth charter, but soon discovers there are intruders intent on stopping the signing.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka and Tyr are taken over by the energy from a dimensional tunnel. Dylan, Trance and Harper must save them before they destroy the ship.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Shards of Rimni
programme.desc: Dylan is framed for murder and must clear his name while finding the pieces of a vase said to grant the owner the "blessings of the cosmos.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Mad to Be Saved
programme.desc: The crew rescues a group of refugees, only to discover they have been subject to government experiments and are extremely unstable.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.47
programme.desc: A woman’s finger is broken after an argument at a party over alleged cocaine use; she claims she was pushed down the stairs by her roommate/Arrested as a result of bouncing two checks, a man sues a former friend who gave them to him.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.100
programme.desc: An economic stimulus check is allegedly stolen by a woman’s ex- husband/A woman is suing her ex-boyfriend for an unpaid loan to help him flip a house and for an unpaid parking ticket.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.129
programme.desc: Prohibited confetti poppers at school cause serious injury; parents and teens dispute liability/Man sues granddaughter's boyfriend for cashing fraudulent check in relative's bank account.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.144
programme.desc: Young woman weeps as mother seeks reimbursement for apartment co-signing. Dog's vet bill sparks dispute with mother-in-law.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.134
programme.desc: Ex-lovers dispute $200,000+ debt, a pistol, and a high school ring as gifts or loans; jealousy involved. Woman and best friend's daughter-in-law disagree on eBay sales proceeds' whereabouts, one claims check was mailed.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.59
programme.desc: Horseplay at party leads to children pushed into pool, parents argue over damaged iPod and ruined hairdo. Woman sues daughter for eleven car payments on 2000 Ford Escort; daughter, mother of four, cites no expectation of repayment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.228
programme.desc: Car salesman sues ex-girlfriend for default on used car sale; she countersues for illegal repossession. Woman's toddlers taken by children's services, blames ex; he and new girlfriend sue for unpaid loan and false allegations.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.258
programme.desc: A custody battle, eBay sales dispute, and check fraud alleged in woman's lawsuit against child's father for storage fees. Man claims son illegally repossessed his motorcycle; son countersues for bike damages.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.131
programme.desc: Man sued by parents after second wife's mysterious death and $40,000 life insurance policy; alleged child abuse involved/Man calls cops to remove ex-girlfriend from apartment, sues her for rent after she leaves, fearing for his life.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.175
programme.desc: Man accused of cheating for 10 years alleges friend vandalized his car. Woman accused of violently kicking car while witnessing couple making out inside.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.99
programme.desc: Lawyer with 42 years clashes with Judge as ex-friends dispute Miami plane ticket cost/Repossessed car due to red light running, unauthorized driving, and missed payments.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay switches up the groups in the hope of helping them out and selects another contestant to leave.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay has a new task for the remaining contestants. He asks them to prepare a complete dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay calls the participants to the Grand Central Market in Los Angeles, where he asks them to prepare a three-course meal using fresh ingredients.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: There are only five chefs left, but Ramsay is only taking a few with him on the trip to Las Vegas, and this causes envy and irritation among other competitors.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final four chefs impress at the start of dinner service, but things take a turn for the worse and no one in the kitchen is safe.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Strapped on the Court
programme.desc: Matt and Froy have to choose between the job and their lives when they're confronted by a dozen gun-toting basketball players. Then, Lou and Sonia have to crash a night-time family reunion to get their car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Role-players and Blade Swayers
programme.desc: Lou, Matt, and Froy get interrupted on a routine job by a registered owner with an unregistered blade. Then, Matt and Froy head out to the country to reclaim a Prius from a quintet of socially maladapted role-players.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Caught with Their Pants Down
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy's relationship takes a strange turn on a repo that puts them face-to-face with two strangers caught with their pants down. Then, Lou and Lyndah head to a remote ranch where they confront a duo of indecent roughnecks.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Honor Rolling Away
programme.desc: Sonia and Lyndah find themselves at a local University trying to reclaim a car from a not-so-honorable honor roll student with a squeaky voice. Then, Matt and Sonia are tasked with snagging a tricked-out race car from two vested thugs armed with golf club.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Tazed and Amazed
programme.desc: Matt and Froy need to call in the cops to help out with an inebriated old-timer armed with a tazer. Then, on a journey for a Journey, Lou and Froy battle with a bowler. And finally, Froy and Lyndah deal with a back-peddling super-sized owner of a Nissan A.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Intoxicated Marina Idiots
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia are on a hunt for a 2007 Porsche & a 2008 Audi from the same drug dealing debtor. Next, Matt and Froy pry a truck from a group of intoxicated idiots at a marina. And finally, Matt and Lou hit up an upscale Glendale neighborhood to...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Playing the Role
programme.desc: First, Lou devises a plan to have Froy and Sonia pose as house buyers, and a happily married couple, meanwhile Matt and Lou will hook and book. Then, Matt and Froy wrangle with an out-of-work actor.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Broken Bones and Broken Phones
programme.desc: First, Froy, Lou, and Matt wrestle a group of bodybuilders when going after a Jeep Commander. Next, an unemployed stockbroker gets a rude awakening when Lou and Lyndah wake him up inside his car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Hearse Isn't Empty?
programme.desc: Matt and Lou find themselves in an upscale neighborhood, facing off with a distraught accountant and his belligerent, kick-happy son. Then, Sonia and Froy crash a pool party where the guests were happy to give up their clothes, but they're not willing...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Froy Gets Beat Up
programme.desc: Sonia and Lou see the signs of the bad economy first-hand when a rich couple willing give up their late-model Landcruiser. Then, Matt and Sonia need to contend with a spoiled princess whose daddy forgot to pay the bill on her Jetta.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Pimp My Bride
programme.desc: Russell reluctantly agrees to host a photo shoot in his apartment for Audrey's magazine, with the hope of landing a date with a hot model. Adam steps in to play the groom in Audrey's wedding-themed shoot.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff’s New Friend
programme.desc: Jeff is surprised when Audrey informs him that the new friend he made at the gym is gay. Meanwhile, Russell worries the young woman he's dating might be his daughter.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Voluntary Commitment
programme.desc: After a long line of female assistants, Russell learns that having a male assistant can be very advantageous. Meanwhile, after volunteering to read to the elderly, Audrey makes a bet with Jeff that she can commit to finishing a project.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dad's Visit
programme.desc: Much to Audrey's dismay, Jeff's chauvinist father, who expects Audrey to wait on him hand and foot, extends his visit after spraining his ankle. Meanwhile, Russell has a one-night stand with a woman who won't leave his apartment.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Secret
programme.desc: Audrey discovers that Russell is a closeted fan of Broadway musicals, a fact she promises to keep secret in exchange for free theater tickets. Meanwhile, Adam and Jennifer take dancing lessons in preparation for their wedding.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Twice
programme.desc: When Audrey becomes jealous of a pregnant co-worker, she inadvertently convinces her colleagues that she has a bundle of joy on the way too.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Lyin' King
programme.desc: Things quickly get complicated when Audrey and Jeff decide to ditch a dinner date with Jennifer and Adam in order to attend Brad and Jackie's exclusive, celebrity packed party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Family Style
programme.desc: When Audrey plans a dinner date with Jeff, Jackie (Guest Star Sam Harris) and Brad (Guest Star Orlando Jones), Jeff feels extremely violated when Jackie begins eating off his plate!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Sex Toy Story
programme.desc: When Jennifer and Audrey throw a 'girls only' sex party, Jeff quickly gets insecure when he finds a 'product' Audrey may have purchased.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: House Money
programme.desc: When Jennifer and Russell decide to teach Adam a lesson in responsibility, the joke is on them when Adam has the last laugh.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Destiny Love
programme.desc: Dog is in for a big surprise after he catches a fugitive named Jonaven in a sting operation.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If You Knew Nunu
programme.desc: Dog and the team really have their hands full when they go after a tough guy named Nunu, who leads them on a chase through apartment complexes and a shopping mall before he's finally captured.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Dog's feeling lucky, so he's going to try to capture two women in one day. The first, Moani, has "crazy" tattooed on her neck and is facing drug charges. The second fugitive, Jade, who turns out to be a tough catch, despite help from Jade's sister.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Island, Small Town
programme.desc: Dog has problems when he goes to a small town on the Big Island of Hawaii to track down a fugitive. In a small town, everyone knows everyone else's business, making it impossible for Dog to hunt in secret.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jonah is Missing
programme.desc: Dog and the team search for Jonah, a violent and desperate criminal facing?20 years in jail. The trail goes stale when Dog runs into evasive family members and an angry girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Suga On My Cuffs
programme.desc: Dog and the team go after Kandice, AKA Candy, AKA Suga, a stripper who didn't make her court appearance. They convince one of her friends to lure her to a supermarket parking lot, where Dog has an easy time fetching the fetching young thing. But then.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.sub-title: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.(n)

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: Beneath the icy surface, survivors of Colony Seven struggle as food supplies dwindle and temperatures drop. Plagued by illness, the colonists suspect the worst when they mysteriously lose contact with Colony Five, the only other known settlement.(n)

programme.title: Ultrasound
programme.desc: A dark puzzle-box sci-fi in the vein of ‘Memento’ and ‘Primer’.(n)

programme.title: Young Guns
programme.desc: In a lawless and violent time, six young outcasts are hired by an English merchant as 'regulators' to guard his ranch against the mob, a corrupt and powerful ring.(n)

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: An ex-con and his adopted younger brother are forced to go on the run. Chased by a criminal, the feds, and a cadre of soldiers, their only protection is a found weapon of mysterious ancestry.(n)

programme.title: Tomboy
programme.desc: Frank Kitchen is an assassin at the top of his game. When he's double-crossed, by a group of ruthless gangsters, he falls into the hands of a rogue surgeon known only as The Doctor, who transforms him into a woman against his will.(n)

programme.title: Payback
programme.desc: A pair of debt collectors are thrust into an explosively dangerous situation, chasing down various lowlifes while also evading a vengeful kingpin.(n)

programme.title: Finding Mrs. Claus
programme.desc: When Mrs. Claus (Mira Sorvino) feels neglected by her less than attentive husband (Will Sasso), she goes to Las Vegas to help a little girl with her Christmas wish.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Village
programme.desc: To save her reputation, Piper Jensen, a public relations genius and owner of her own PR company, agrees to work for the owner of a failing Santa’s Village and discovers love and how magical Christmas is after all.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Cupcakes
programme.desc: With their family bakery facing foreclosure, two sisters must team-up to try and save it by entering a TV baking competition.(n)

programme.title: Vows of Deception
programme.desc: When a prominent lawyer is found murdered, his wife is promptly arrested and charged with the crime. She swiftly accuses her stepson, with whom she claims to be having an affair.(n)

programme.title: Sugar Baby Murder
programme.desc: After graduating from college, 21 year old Bridget moves to a new town with her best friend Lindsay. Desperately needing a job to support her budding writing career, she takes a job as an EA to business tycoon Anthony Gloss.(n)

programme.title: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
programme.desc: Two people (Tom Atkins, Stacey Nelkin) discover that a TV commercial will cue a madman's (Dan O'Herlihy) Halloween masks to explode.(n)

programme.title: The Mist
programme.desc: Trapped townspeople (Thomas Jane, Marcia Gay Harden, Laurie Holden) face monsters inside and out after a supernatural fog engulfs their Maine community.(n)

programme.title: Red Sun: Red Sun
programme.desc: In 1870, a gang robs a train and steals a ceremonial Japanese sword meant as a gift for the U.S. President, prompting a manhunt to retrieve it.(n)

programme.title: Joshua
programme.desc: A black soldier returns from fighting in the Civil War only to find out that his mother, maid to a frontier family has been murdered by a gang of bandits. He becomes a bounty hunter, determined to track down and kill the men who killed his mother.(n)

programme.title: The Last Of The Mohicans
programme.desc: As Alice and Cora Munro attempt to find their father, a British officer in the French and Indian War, they are set upon by French soldiers and their cohorts, Huron tribesmen led by the evil Magua.(n)

programme.title: A Second Chance
programme.desc: A young girl and her coach overcome adversity to make their way into the National Australian Gymnastics Squad.(n)

programme.title: Mandie and the Secret Tunnel
programme.desc: In 1899, Mandie's life changes when her Cherokee friends help her escape to a mansion that holds the hidden secrets of her past and the key to her future.(n)

programme.title: Class Rank
programme.desc: Starring Olivia Holt (Cloak & Dagger), Skyler Gisondon (Booksmart) and Bruce Dern (The Senator). Two high school outsiders join forces to overtake the local school board.(n)

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Max and Page are a brilliant mother and daughter con team who have their gift down to a fine art.(n)

programme.title: Bachelorette
programme.desc: On the night before an old friend's wedding, three frisky bridesmaids go searching for a little fun but find much more than they bargained for.(n)

programme.title: British Screen Classics
programme.desc: British Screen Classics brings you the very best of British film and TV. Showing a range of genre across comedy, horror, war, drama, adventure and romance, you’ll find the cinema you love all in one place.(n)

programme.title: Circus of Horrors
programme.desc: Tale about a renegade plastic surgeon on the run from the police, who becomes the owner of a run-down circus. Before long, the performers experience a series of horrific accidents.(n)

programme.title: Night of the Eagle
programme.desc: A sceptical college professor learns the true power of the occult when he attempts to rescue his wife from Satanists.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: The Last Goodbye
programme.desc: A performance by the son of a rock and roll legend leads Johnny and Sarah (Nicole de Boer) on a search for clues about the mysterious death of his famous father.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Take My Life... Please!//Devil's Alphabet/The Library
programme.sub-title: Take My Life... Please!//Devil's Alphabet/The Library
programme.desc: A comedian killed by his rival finds himself in a strange stage show; something's off/In Victorian England, Cambridge grads are bound by an oath even in death/A woman starts at an odd library.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: After Hours/Lost and Found
programme.desc: Marsha Cole detects shadowy figures and mysterious voices around her during a trip to a local shopping mall/College student Jennifer Templeton finds out why her possessions have been vanishing.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Storyteller
programme.desc: In the early 20th century a young woman takes a job as a teacher in a one-room schoolhouse. One of her students, Mica, secretly takes extra books home to read.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Curious Case of Edgar Witherspoon
programme.sub-title: The Curious Case of Edgar Witherspoon
programme.desc: A woman tries to get her Uncle Edgar committed, believing that he is senile. The investigating doctor finds Edgar living in an apartment containing all kinds of junk.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Extra Innings
programme.desc: Ex-baseball player Ed Hamler, lame from an injury and forced to retire early is given a 1909 baseball card of a player that looks exactly like him. The card is magical in that he becomes drawn into it and lives out the life of the player in the past.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Crossing
programme.desc: A stressed-out priest repeatedly encounters a station wagon containing a young girl. The car keeps crashing and bursting into flames.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Fata Morgana
programme.desc: Dr. Helen Magnus, her daughter Ashley, and new to the Sanctuary, Dr. Will Zimmerman release three women from a mysterious crypt in Scotland, bringing them back to the Sanctuary for refuge.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Folding Man
programme.desc: An investigation into a string of bizarre robberies leads Magnus and Will to a crime ring of thieves who seem to be able to slip between the cracks of the law…literally.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Kush
programme.desc: Returning with an abnormal captured in the Himalayas, Magnus and Will are stranded from civilization and aid after their plane goes down in a desolate mountain range.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Nubbins
programme.desc: When a mating pair of cute, furry and seemingly harmless abnormals is brought in for scientific study, the Sanctuary team begins to exhibit some hidden animal attractions for one another.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Quadzilla Attacks!
programme.desc: Extreme Quadzilla ATV, the fastest 4 wheeler ever; a 1910s Remington Derringer and an 1880s Palm Squeezer pistol; revolutionary 1800s Western Electric telephone with a crank dial.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Dead Aim
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face-off against an auction buyer with shady bidding tactics and even more questionable fashion sense. The guys find a custom-built monowheel & a rifle designed to ward off grave robbers in the early 19th century!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sidecar Surprise
programme.desc: An unassuming mom in an oversized sweater tries to pull the wool over Ton & Allen's eyes at a storage auction in Arlington, VA. The guys uncover a black powder cannon designed in the 15th century & a Russian military motorcycle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Beantown Bidders
programme.desc: 1800s blackpowder whaling harpoon; 1940s Schwinn Town & Country tandem bicycle; a vintage American flag collection that could be worth thousands.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Diesel Digs
programme.desc: The guys head to the industrial hub of LA to score some heavy machinery and unearth a 1981 Bobcat 743 Frontloader, one of the first powered by a diesel engine and a trench-defending WWI German Sturmtrupp helmet bashing mace.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Easy Money
programme.desc: Allen & Ton head to New Orleans in search of easy money, but instead encounter some bayou bidders with big-time bucks! They discover a pair of early 19th-century dueling pistols & a vintage airboat fitted with a turbine engine!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fire in the Hole!
programme.desc: 1930s "blasting machine" dynamite detonator box; 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments. Ton smelts jewelry to forge bricks of silver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Bowling Pin Payday
programme.desc: Allen & Ton visit Ton's old stompin' ground and go head-to-head with a trash-talking auction buyer. They uncover a 19th century rifle with a matching cutlass bayonet and a mechanical bowling pinsetter from the early 1960's!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Auction Hunters, Ink.
programme.desc: Autographed 1960s Bob Shaw Swing Gate tattoo machine; Terry Ives competition 22hp chainsaw; six foot chainsaw-carved cedar bear.(n)
